official_title: A bill to convey public land to the Catholic Diocese of Reno/Las Vegas, Nevada.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified lands to the Catholic Diocese of Reno/Las Vegas, Nevada. Requires the Diocese to pay administrative costs of such conveyance.

titles.title: A bill to convey public land to the Catholic Diocese of Reno/Las Vegas, Nevada.
